content.question: ​Consecutive terms of a sequence have the values <math alttext="6"><semantics><mn>6</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="2"><semantics><mn>2</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="negative 2"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="negative 6"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. choices.label: ​The terms could be part of an arithmetic sequence with a common difference of <math alttext="negative 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The terms could be part of a geometric sequence with a common difference of <math alttext="negative 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​​The terms could be part of an arithmetic sequence with a common ratio of <math alttext="negative 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​​The terms could be part of a geometric sequence with a common ratio of <math alttext="negative 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​The terms could be part of an arithmetic sequence with a common difference of <math alttext="negative 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.
